generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is the main surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible along the sides of the road, separated by curbs and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including commercial structures with signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, mounted on poles.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional arrows and regulatory signs.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, above the buildings.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalks.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides.
- truck: A truck is visible parked on the left side of the street.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the street.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible being ridden by a person on the left side of the street.
